title: Message to the Police Commissioner of New York City.
text:
My dear Mr. Commissioner:

I want to assure you of my grateful appreciation of the fine arrangements made by your Department for my recent visit.

The valued service rendered by the members of the force added much to the comfort of the party. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Commissioner Edward P. Mulrooney, Police Headquarters, Center Street, New York, New York]
